title: Top three champions, riot is drunk.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Like, honestly, I used my w and e a hell of a lot more than my q, but~ "How to play sona q q q." {{sticker:sg-lux-2}} 

[](https://gyazo.com/c7f527cf932f02bcf8a0b5bd1127819a) And it also seems that most of the quotes are just insults, made me a little sad, like my Zyra flat out said: "Reported for being toxic." I am good! {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
